name: Boot Shapers Tab
description:
For our retailers and everyone else! The same great product but with a spot for your corporate logo, price sticker, etc.  Minimum order of 100 is required for custom work.  Volume discounts.  Non-customized available as well.   

Email us for details (sales@bootshapers.ca) regarding pricing and shipping.  Retailer orders are taken via email or phone (not via this site)

name: Boot Shapers
description:
Shipping $4 / pair * Free shipping special when you purchase 4 pairs.

Roll them up and pop them in. Shape Your Bootie boot shapers lie flat for easy storage and ease of travel when not in your boots.

Keep your boots upright.  They last longer that way. *Viagra for your boots!

Tax included.

Please contact us for volume discounts. 

Customize  100+ pairs minimum.

If you would prefer to pick up your boot shapers we are located in Vancouver BC. Contact us for details.

For shipping outside of Canada, please send us an email sales@bootshapers.ca.  We will respond within the hour if your email reaches us between (9:30 am -5 pm Pacific Time).

*FOR A LIMITED TIME WHEN YOU PURCHASE 4 PAIRS OF SHAPE YOUR BOOTIE BOOT SHAPERS, SHIPPING ANYWHERE IN CANADA IS FREE

options.name: Free Shipping!  For a limited time shipping is free in Canada when you purchase 4 Regular Shape Your Bootie boot shapers.
